attributes.action: Reopen swimming pools for lessons during COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Learning to swim is an incredibly important life skill. It should continue during COVID-19 locks
attributes.background: Reopen swimming lessons for children and adults learning to swim during lockdown

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow open-air swimming pools, lidos & lakes to open in a new Covid-19 lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555079

Allow swimming pools to remain open during Covid-19 in all alert levels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554540

Keep swimming pools open during all stages of lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557695
